groceries.name: Terry's Chocolate Orange
groceries.description: Milk chocolate flavoured orange with real orange oil. Suitable for vegetarians

groceries.name: Popworks Sweet & Salty Sharing Popped Crisps
groceries.description:
Sweet and salty corn crisps.
Gluten free, suitable for vegans.
Because our crisps are popped and never fried, you get crunch, taste and fun all in one delicious snack. Popworks take just a handful of key ingredients to create brilliantly crunchy snacks that pack a real flavour punch.

groceries.name: Sainsbury's Lentil Triangles Prawn Cocktail
groceries.description: Lentil and potato snacks with a prawn cocktail flavour seasoning.

groceries.name: Magnum Vegan Almond Ice Cream Sticks 3x90ml
groceries.description: Discover Magnum Classic Vegan Ice Cream Sticks, featuring a velvety vanilla flavour vegan ice cream base dipped in Magnum’s signature “cracking” chocolate couverture

groceries.name: Hovis Seed Sensations Seven Seeds Medium Sliced Seeded Bread 800g
groceries.description: A scrumptious blend of seeds including toasted brown linseed, toasted sunflower, pumpkin, golden linseed, millet and poppy seeds giving an unmistakable flavour and texture.

groceries.name: Haribo Share the Happy Mini Bag Multipack Sweets 352g
groceries.description:
Fizzy and Fruit Flavour Gums, Cola Gums, Milk Flavour Gums and Sweet Foam Gums
Strawberry Flavour Gums

groceries.name: Pizza Express Margherita Pizza 245g
groceries.description:
A pizza base topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella and Cheddar cheese and a sprinkle of oregano and black pepper.
The Icons Range at Home
Creamy mozzarella, Cheddar & passata on our classic base,
Suitable for vegetarians.
At PizzaExpress, we believe that mealtimes should be one of life's highlights. It's why only the freshest and perfectly sourced ingredients will do. And why every dish is made with care - and flair.
Because at PizzaExpress, a pizza doesn't just mean dinnertime. It means showtime.

groceries.name: Sainsbury's Easy Peelers, Taste the Difference 600g
groceries.description:
Easy Peelers Class I
Chosen for their perfectly balanced flavour and sweet juicy flesh

groceries.name: Mccain Home Chips Chips Crinkle 1.6kg
groceries.description:
The nation's favourite

Crispy, Fluffy Perfection

100% British Potatoes

Suitable for Vegans

Halal - HFA Approved

Kosher - SKA

McCain Home Chips coated potato chips are crispy, golden and simply delicious.
Their unique crunchy coating gives them a really scrumptious taste. Enjoy!

For more information see www.mccain.co.uk

Did You know?
We're helping Our Farmers adopt Regenerative Agricultural practices across 100% of their potato fields by 2030.
To find out more about our commitment visit www.mccain.co.uk/sustainability

We believe every family should be able to enjoy mealtimes together, taking time for the little moments that matter.
For some families, this isn't always possible.
That's why McCain have committed to donating...
£1M to Family Fund by 2023, to help them reach their goal of providing 150,000 grants & services to UK families with disabled and seriously ill children.*
To find out more about our partnership with Family Fund, or to make a donation, visit www.mccainfamilyfund.co.uk.
*£1m is guaranteed to be donated to the UK charity Family Fund Trust by 2023 (registered charity no. 1053866, Scottish charity no. SC040810), to fund grants to bring UK families together at mealtimes and provide information & support services.
McCain will donate £300k in 2021, and £350k in 2022 & 2023.
Donations from ROI residents are welcome.
